name: ElemenTech
description:
ElemenTech is a competitive 4-player fighting couch game made using Unity Engine. This was a school project that was made over the span of one year that involved students from different disciplines such as programming, game design and 3D modelers and artists. 

In the game each player selects a specific elemental character to play as. The basic movement and combat mechanics that all characters share is being able to jump, melee attack and shoot a ranged projectile. However, based on your element your character will have unique skills and traits that if utilized and mastered correctly can assist you in defeating your opponents. At the same time, don't forget that each level has its own characteristics to them, combining your characters traits and abilities with the terrain of the level is essential in outplaying your opponents, so  good luck and fight and survive. 

*This game is still in it's beta stage as there are a few bugs that still need to be addressed and also a lot of polish that is still needed. Thank you though for playing  trying our game :). We will continue to make updates to our game in the ongoing future.* 

Created by: Stan Palisoc, Weixiang Gao, Joey Liu, Jesus Gutierrez. 

3D Artwork & Backgrounds: Clara Salomano de Faria, Hong Mu, Pannawit Cheewasereechol, Eric Sebastian Hernandez.
